activities: Delaware North Companies, Incorporated uses the information collected from EU residents to process payments for and to deliver any merchandise purchased on line.  The collected personal information is also used in responding to inquires or comments sent to us via email or the "contact us" section on our website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Delaware North Companies Incorporated will use the American Arbitration Association (AAA) as an independant recourse mechanism to resolve any issues relating to unresolved complaints concerning personal information received from EU residents.
